name: World Summit and Expo on 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing
content: Dear Colleagues and Friends: We would like to formally invite you to be a speaker for the prestigious World Summit and Expo on 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing (WSE3DPAM-2024) scheduled to take place in Prague, Czech Republic during December 02-04, 2024\. This event promises to be a groundbreaking moment in the field of 3D Printing and we believe your expertise and insights will be invaluable to its success.
